types.html:
trente-sixième dessous m (uncountable)

  1. (informal) a very miserable situation, a very dark place, a very sad and unhappy state
    tomber dans le trente-sixième dessous ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)
    être au trente-sixième dessous ― to be down in the dumps, to be thoroughly depressed, to be a basket case

Usage notes

[edit]

Always used with the definite article le.
trans: a very miserable situation, a very dark place, a very sad and unhappy state

title: trente-sixième dessous
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /tʁɑ̃t.si.zjɛm də.su/
